thread.section_title: The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely stay
thread.title_full: Lovely stay - Review of The Royal Park - A Roseate House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: English_At_Heart_002
title: Lovely stay
text: What a fabulous find, we stayed one night as the friend we were meeting was staying here so we just booked at the same hotel. We loved it, all of the staff were welcoming & professional. Our room was super with it's own balcony where we sat & enjoyed coffee in the sun. The location is perfect, so close to Paddington but on a very quiet street. We will definitely be back.
